member.name: T:Synthesys.Plugins.SQLMap.SqlMapInjectionVector
member.summary: A way to request a page which results in the ability to read/write otherwise protected data, execute code, etc.

member.name: T:Synthesys.Plugins.SQLMap.SqlMapReaction
member.summary: Creates SQLmap Tasks when URLArtifacts with GET/POST fields are found

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.SQLMap.SqlMapReport.InjectionVectors
member.summary: Points where a SQL injection can succeed

member.name: T:Synthesys.Plugins.SQLMap.SqlMapScanner
member.summary: sqlmap is an open source penetration testing tool that automates the process of detecting and exploiting SQL injection flaws and taking over of database servers. It comes with a powerful detection engine, many niche features for the ultimate penetration tester and a broad range of switches lasting from database fingerprinting, over data fetching from the database, to accessing the underlying file system and executing commands on the operating system via out-of-band connections.

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.SQLMap.SqlMapScanner.Aggressive
member.summary: If TRUE, SQLmap will run at Level 5/Risk Level 3 instead of the default Level 2/Risk Level 1
